title: A Park for all seasons
creator_credit: David Meagher and ACMI Content Development
brief_description: Mossvale Park, nestled between Leongatha and Mirboo North in South Gippsland, is host to all types of community events from family barbeques to music festivals. Matt Dennis tells us why he is drawn to this “natural and beautiful place”.
description: Mossvale Park, nestled between Leongatha and Mirboo North in South Gippsland, is host to all types of community events from family barbeques to music festivals. Matt Dennis tells us why he is drawn to this “natural and beautiful place”.
